pullRequest.title: Fix Load Ladder Maps
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes #1918
Removes the change listener to the state as that seemed to not do anything and was overridden by the loadshowroom.
Does not cause the show user replays to break.

nodes.bodyText: Well I think you fixed it but now if you click the back button after the search it showroom is empty. That is why this code existed. Maybe easier would be check if state is uninitialized on back button click and call loadShowRoom then
